subsection.name: Description
subsection.div:
Checks that non-constant field names conform to the
Google Java Style Guide for non-constant field naming.
subsection.p: This check enforces Google's specific non-constant field naming requirements:

ul.li: Non-constant field names must start with a lowercase letter and use uppercase letters for word boundaries.
Underscores may be used to separate adjacent numbers (e.g., version numbers like guava33_4_5), but NOT between letters and digits.

subsection.p: Static fields are skipped because Checkstyle cannot determine type immutability to distinguish constants from non-constants.

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
